alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, eastern Onslow and west central Carteret Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camp Lejeune Center, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Morehead City, New River Station, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Silverdale, Midway Park, Verona, Belgrade, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue, Sneads Ferry and Deppe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
